summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4131 for the improvement of alley in Block 4, Montlake Park Addition, being the alley running east and west in the block between Hamlin Street and the old Government Canal right-of-way, from East Park Drive to Montlake Boulevard, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49491, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
